CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS( TEXT(Contract_Type__c), 'PPA-DIS') || CONTAINS( TEXT(Contract_Type__c) , 'CPA-RES') || CONTAINS( TEXT(Contract_Type__c), 'PPA-RES') || CONTAINS( TEXT(Contract_Type__c), 'PPA-RES') || CONTAINS( TEXT(Contract_Type__c), 'US Distributor - Legacy') || CONTAINS( TEXT(Contract_Type__c), 'Reseller - (FNOK)') || CONTAINS( TEXT(Contract_Type__c), 'Reseller - (FALU)') || CONTAINS( TEXT(Contract_Type__c), 'Services Partner Agreement') || CONTAINS( TEXT(Contract_Type__c), 'CPA-DIS') || CONTAINS( TEXT(Contract_Type__c), 'NIRA') || CONTAINS( TEXT(Contract_Type__c), 'PFA')|| CONTAINS( TEXT(Contract_Type__c), 'PFA-RES') || CONTAINS( TEXT(Contract_Type__c), 'PFA-DIS'), True,False)
CustomField.label: Is Product Agreement
